name: Block Puzzle (itch) (joea6013)
description:
Block Puzzle is an addictive brain teaser with simple yet challenging games designed to train your brain. It will keep you entertained for hours.

Features:
- Click the coin to get free coins and buy new themes.
- Combine puzzle blocks in order to build and destroy full lines vertically or horizontally.
- Start and stop any time, no matter where you go.
- No time limit, no color matching! Just fill the grid with shapes to form a line.
- Unlock various achievements after completing the missions.
- Reach the TOP of Leaderboard to compete with friends.
